Description: Rim sherd of North Ionian pottery lotus bowl. Interior; reserved band at rim, glazed below, with added red band lined in white; exterior: maeander square to left of part of lotus flower; line below; below that a band and two lines preserved.
Curator's comments: Probably from the same bowl as 1924,1201.874 and 876.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.595)
